author: YourName
description: A brief description of your sound pack

carhit._info: Crash/collision sounds. Any filename works. Multiple files = random selection.

checkpoint._info: Generic checkpoint sounds (when no PB comparison available).

checkpoint-yes._info: Played when checkpoint time is FASTER than PB.

checkpoint-no._info: Played when checkpoint time is SLOWER than PB.

lap._info: Lap completion sounds. IMPORTANT: Include 'final' in filename for final lap sound!

medal._info: Medal sounds. IMPORTANT: Filename MUST contain: 'author', 'gold', 'silver', or 'bronze'

_naming_rules.lap: Files with 'final' in name are used for the final lap
_naming_rules.medal: Files MUST contain 'author', 'gold', 'silver', or 'bronze' in the filename

_notes: Categories are optional - missing categories will have no sound
Multiple files per category = random selection each time
Keys starting with '_' are ignored (use for comments)
URLs must be direct download links to .wav files
